description:
A new stage and new challenge lie ahead!

The Mask Maniac has new masks and shells available! Show off your individuality through new outfits in multiplayer!

The Encore Pack includes:
• New Area: Encore Peak (3 stages)
• New Tower: Missile
• 4 New Masks
• 4 New Shells
name: PixelJunk™ Monsters 2 Encore Pack
